item.title: Shops Help [Project Insanity] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Resent:

Thanks, but how can I make it so when you sell the items to the shop, it doesn’t add that item into stock?

I don’t know the exact method name, but I’m pretty sure it has something to do with refreshing the shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Help [Project Insanity] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Derpington Derpington
item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

go to shops.cfg (server sided), u see the items and the amount of it after each npc. Change the first "2"s to "1"s. Now you can sell any item to that shop.

I hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Help [Project Insanity] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

How can I make it so items can be sold to shops? Here’s my method that’s preventing it:

/** *Sell item to shop (Shop Price) **/ public void sellToShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot) { for (int i : Config.ITEM_SELLABLE) { if (i == removeId) { c.sendMessage("You can't sell "+c.getItems().getItemName(removeId).toLowerCase()+"."); return;

Thanks,

Anthony

Read full topic
